word_mean: 改变原飞行计划，使航空器飞到非预定点或备降机场的航行措施。

sentence.Network_cn: 这场辩论分散了人们的注意力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin diversio(n-), from Latin divertere 'turn aside' (see divert)

entry.tran: 转移注意力的行为;令人分心的事情
entry.def: A diversion is an action or event that attracts your attention away from what you are doing or concentrating on.

example.ex: The robbers threw smoke bombs to create a diversion...
example.tran: 劫匪扔烟幕弹来转移人们的视线。

example.ex: The whole argument is a diversion.
example.tran: 这场辩论分散了人们的注意力。

entry.def: A diversion is an activity that you do for pleasure.

example.ex: Finger painting is very messy but an excellent diversion.
example.tran: 用手指画画是很脏，但却是一项极好的消遣。

entry.def: A diversion is a special route arranged for traffic to follow when the normal route cannot be used.

example.ex: They turned back because of traffic diversions.
example.tran: 因为交通要临时绕行，他们掉头了。

entry.def: The diversion of something involves changing its course or destination.

example.ex: ...the illegal diversion of profits from secret arms sales.
example.tran: 秘密军火交易所获利润的非法转移

example.ex: ...the diversion of a ship to Lebanon with $8m worth of aluminium on board.
example.tran: 前往黎巴嫩的装有价值800万美元铝的船只改换航道

means.word_mean: 1. an activity that diverts or amuses or stimulates;

sentences.sentence: "scuba diving is provided as a diversion for tourists"
"for recreation he wrote poetry and solved crossword puzzles"
"drug abuse is often regarded as a form of recreation"

means.word_mean: 2. a turning aside (of your course or attention or concern);
3. an attack calculated to draw enemy defense away from the point of the principal attack

auth_sentence.content: They looked expectant, unoccupied, ready for diversion.
auth_sentence.res_content: They looked expectant, unoccupied, ready for diversion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They looked expectant, unoccupied, ready for diversion.

auth_sentence.content: Is the whole argument just a useless semantic diversion?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is the whole argument just a useless semantic diversion?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is the whole argument just a useless semantic diversion?

auth_sentence.content: There has been no diversion in our program.
auth_sentence.res_content: There has been no diversion in our program.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There has been no diversion in our program.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad向+vers转+e→转向不利的
a坏+vers转+e→往坏转→反感的
con一起+verse=vers转+ant……的→在一起转→很熟悉的
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
di分开+vers转+e→转开了→不同的
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的
ir不+reversible[adj.可逆的]→adj.不可逆转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per始终+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
re反+vers转+e→反转的
reverse反转的+ible可..的→可反转的,可逆的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 横向的, 横断的, 截线的
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍的, 全体的, 通用的, 宇宙的, 世界的
stems_affixes.word_buile: universe[n.宇宙,万物]+al表形容词→宇宙的→普遍的, 全体的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vers转+atile→玩得转,有才能的
vers转+ed……的→转过的,已经熟练了→熟练的
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ary人→n.对手,敌手
adverse[adj.逆的,相反的;敌对的;不利的;有害的]+ity表名词→n.不幸,灾难
anni=ann+vers转+ary表名词→一年转到一次→周年纪念日
averse[adj.厌恶的,反对的]+ion表名词→n.嫌恶,憎恨
converse[v.谈话,交谈,认识]+ation表名词→n.会话,谈话
con共同+vers转+e→两个共同对着转→相反的
con共同+vers转+ion表名词→n.转变,转换;信仰的改变

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转向,转移;牵制;解闷;娱乐
stems_affixes.word_buile: di离开+vers转+ion表名词→转偏离→转向
diverse多样的+ity表名词→n.多样,变化万千
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 腐败行为, 渎职, 贪污, 盗用
stems_affixes.word_buile: mal坏+vers转+ation表名词→转坏了→做官做坏
perverse[adj.刚愎自用的,故意作对的]+ity表名词→n.刚愎,背理行为
trans横+vers转+al……的→adj.横向的, 横断的, 截线的 n.[数学]截线, 横肌
uni一个+vers转+e→统一旋转,宇宙
universe[n.宇宙,万物]+ity表名词→由宇宙引申为知识,知识之地→大学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
stems_affixes.word_buile: versatile[adj.通用的;多才多艺的,多方面的]+ity表名词→n.多才多艺;用途广泛,万能
vers转+e→转着反复说的话
vers转+ion表名词→从原文转过来的→译文
diverse多样的+ify……化→v.使不同;[使]多样化
in进+vers转+e→转进去得→倒转的

Sentence.sentence: But there is also time for brief diversions onto bizarre ground, such as a discussion of the skyscraper index (which holds that a boom in skyscraper construction is a foolproof sign of an imminent recessio.

sentences.en: High tariffs often cause a diversion of trade from one country to another.
sentences.cn: 高额关税常使贸易从一国转往另一国。

sentences.en: Golf is my father's favourite diversion.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫球是我父亲最喜欢的娱乐。

means.word_mean: 分散注意力,转移视线（或注意力）的事物

sentences.en: The person's talk created a diversion of attention.
sentences.cn: 这个人的话分散了人们的注意力。

jushi.english: Sorry I'm late—there was a traffic diversion due to an accident on the main road.
jushi.chinese: 对不起,我迟到了——因为干道上发生事故临时绕道的缘故。

jushi.english: The person's talk created a diversion of attention.
jushi.chinese: 这个人的话分散了人们的注意力。

jushi.english: Golf is my father's favorite diversion.
jushi.chinese: 高尔夫球是我父亲最喜欢的娱乐。
